body:
Today I was playing on the mc zone servers. While I was playing on Castle adventure I turned on the entety view (F3+B) and noticed this
I never saw that before avicore.
body_tagged:

title: What's that ?

replies.body:
Don't worry, that's just a deadly virus that you activated that is slowly eating away at
your computer. Nothing to worry about
replies.body_tagged:

your computer. Nothing to worry about

replies.body: Good I was worried it would delete the server from my server list, but if thats it. :P
replies.body_tagged: Good I was worried it would delete the server from my server list, but if thats it. :P

replies.body: Apparently there are loads of giant entity's on castle adventure! Maybe, maybe they are huge unicorns attracted by the rainbow! But they are invisible...

replies.body:
Hey Zero :D

I have also seen this on other servers... 

I think it might have something to do with Bukkit or YML :P xDD

IDK
